SELECT REQUESTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS requestNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REQUESTS_T( REQUEST_NO, REQUEST_SORT, REQUEST_DATE, REASON, REQUEST_STATUS, REJECT_REASON, PIC_NO, EMPLOYEE_NO ) VALUES ( #{requestNo}, #{requestSort}, CURRENT_DATE, #{reason}, #{requestStatus}, null, #{picNo}, #{employees.employeeNo} )
INSERT INTO LEAVE_REQUEST_T( REQUEST_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, DURATION, LEAVE_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{requests.requestNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{duration}, #{leaveType} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.REJECT_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO, R.REQUEST_NO,NAME, D.DEPART_NAME, RA.RANK_TITLE AS RANK_TITLE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY R.REQUEST_NO DESC) AS RN, R.REQUEST_NO, R.REQUEST_SORT, R.REQUEST_DATE, R.REASON, R.REJECT_REASON, R.PIC_NO, R.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.NAME, E.DEPARTMENT_NO, E.RANK_NO FROM REQUESTS_T R INNER JOIN EMPLOYEES_T E ON R.EMPLOYEE_NO = E.EMPLOYEE_NO ) R INNER JOIN DEPARTMENTS_T D ON R.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO INNER JOIN RANKS_T RA ON R.RANK_NO = RA.RANK_NO WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
